doc:
Louan Gideon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louan_Gideon 0 Louan Gideon (November 12, 1955 – February 3, 2014) was an American actress best known for her role as antagonist Danielle Atron on Nickelodeon's The Secret World of Alex Mack. She was also the last actress to play Liza Walton Sentell on the long-running soap opera Search for Tomorrow. Louan_Gideon ( November_12_,_1955 – February_3_,_2014 ) was an_American_actress best_known for her_role as antagonist_Danielle_Atron on Nickelodeon 's_The_Secret_World of Alex_Mack . She was also the_last_actress to_play Liza_Walton_Sentell on the_long-running_soap_opera Search for Tomorrow .
